data.actual_result: The text is going out of the pop up in languages that have a longer String
data.expected_result: The text "Add: Role" is inside of the pop up and aligned to it
data.short_description: "Add: Role" is not left-aligned to the pop up modal and has no padding with non-English languages
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your language to German - Go to a Server you can Manage Roles in and click on a user in Chat / Member List - Click on the plus Button to add a role and observe
